channel.title: Need a domain name? (my subdomain service)
channel.description:
hi, i have just set-up my sub domain service, well i got to wait for the homepage to be done buy i can do it manualy atm.
[b]the url?[/b] your url will be the following: [i]yourdomain.rs-server.biz[/i]
[b]were to sign up?[/b] [i]well i have not set-up the homepage yet so you will have to post here. Just post in the layout like so k?[/i]
[code] [b]your site name?[/b] [i]answer here[/i]. [b]your contact email?[/b] [i]answer here[/i]. [b]your site url?[/b] [i]answer here[/i]. [b]Will you allow a small ad on your site?[/b] [i]answer here[/i] [/code] if you allow a small ad on your site you will help me keep the sub domain service alive ;) here is a preview; http://test01.rs-server.biz/ you should get redirected to mitb
note; on the test page it has a pop link to google, it was just for while i was editing the iframe but i cba uploading the new one yet.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 29, 2007, 05:38:16 PM[/size][hr]updated homepage http://rs-server.biz/ its just for while i wait for the new template.

item.title: Need a domain name? (my subdomain service)
item.dc:creator: @error.login cane
item.description:
@error.login wrote:

hi, i have just set-up my sub domain service, well i got to wait for the homepage to be done buy i can do it manualy atm.

the url? your url will be the following:
yourdomain.rs-server.biz

were to sign up?
well i have not set-up the homepage yet so you will have to post here. Just post in the layout like so k?

[b]your site name?[/b] [i]answer here[/i].
[b]your contact email?[/b] [i]answer here[/i].
[b]your site url?[/b] [i]answer here[/i].
[b]Will you allow a small ad on your site?[/b] [i]answer here[/i]

if you allow a small ad on your site you will help me keep the sub domain service alive
here is a preview; http://test01.rs-server.biz/ you should get redirected to mitb

note; on the test page it has a pop link to google, it was just for while i was editing the iframe but i cba uploading the new one yet.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 29, 2007, 05:38:16 PM[/size][hr]updated homepage
http://rs-server.biz/
its just for while i wait for the new template.
